description: "This map is illustrated with drawings of Asian people wearing traditional clothing, including representatives of Sumatra, Java and the Maluku Islands. There are also drawings of important ports such as Bantam (Banten) at the western end of Java."
title: "Asia with the islands adioyning described, the atire of the people, & townes of importance : all of them newly augmented / by I.S., ano Dom: 1626 ; sculptum apud Abrahamum Goos."
